name: Encrypted Cerebellum
desc: Contains encrypted remnants of the Collective network. Needs to be decrypted before it can be returned.
notes:
The Encrypted Cerebellum is a a boss item in Risk of Rain 2 added in the  Alloyed Collective expansion. It is a guaranteed drop from the   Solus Wing.
Though the item has no effect on the player and no direct uses, using the Wandering CHEF, it can be combined with a  Sentry Key,  Prison Matrix,  Rusted Key,  Encrusted Key,  Empathy Cores or  Orphaned Core to create the  Exposed Cerebellum essential for reaching the   Neural Sanctum.
As this item is a "World Unique" item, it will not appear in Yellow Artifact of Command Essences, or be transformed into other items.
